zhTW.title: 台中市區屋齡地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 舊台中市八個行政區的建物落成年份地圖
zhTW.description: 本專題運用台中市政府的開放資料，繪製了舊台中市八個行政區的屋齡地圖，使用者可縮放地圖查看建築資訊。
tools: Mapbox GL JS：圖磚及互動功能

en.title: The Age of Every Building in Downtown Taichung
en.subtitle: History of Taichung in an interactive map
en.description: I scraped the housing information from government sites and made a raster map.
tools: Vue: frontend framework for the app
Mapbox GL JS: display raster tiles and provide basic interactivities

en.title: Taiwanese Gods: Deities and Their Turfs
en.subtitle: Hotspots of popular deities in Taiwan
en.description: I employed exploratory spatial data analysis algorithms to locate hotspots for the ten most popular deities in Taiwan, such as Buddha and Mazu. Then I designed small multiples maps with D3.
tools: Vue: frontend framework for the app
R: spatial data analysis with sf and spdep

zhTW.title: 台灣眾神：各家信仰與祂們的管區
zhTW.subtitle: 用GIS分析台灣各大神明的信仰熱區
zhTW.description: 本專題運用廟宇地理位置的開放資料，找出台灣的十大佛、道及民間信仰，並運用空間分析演算法，找出各神明的信仰熱區。

en.title: The Age of Every Building in Taipei
en.subtitle: History of Taichung in an interactive map
en.description: I visualized the age of buildings in Taipei in this app. When users move cursors, they can see the average age of buildings in a circle of 500 meters diameter.
tools: Turf.js: real-time calculation of average building age
Vue: fronted framework for the app
Mapbox GL JS: framework for the interactive map

zhTW.title: 台北市屋齡地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 視覺化地圖呈現台北市屋齡
zhTW.description: 本互動地圖展示台北市建築屋齡，並提供平均屋齡資訊，在使用者移動游標時，顯示半徑五百公尺內區域的平均屋齡。
tools: Turf.js：在用戶端運算平均屋齡
Mapbox GL JS：地圖視覺及互動功能

en.title: A Lens to the Old Taipei
en.subtitle: A combination of aerial and satellite image
en.description: I scraped historical aerial images from a government website and combined them into a large raster map with ImageMagick. Then I used QGIS to export the map as raster tiles and built an map application with OpenLayers.
tools: OpenLayers: interactive map and the 'Lens' feature
Google Earth Pro: satellite image source
ImageMagick: use 'montage' to combine aerial images

zhTW.title: 台北歷史對照地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 運用衛星圖與歷史航照圖呈現台北街景變遷
zhTW.description: 本互動地圖結合舊航照影像及Google Earth衛星影像，只要滑鼠移到或手機觸控任一地點，就能看到台北市六十年間街景變遷。
tools: Google Earth Pro：擷取衛星影像

en.title: Every Vote Cast in the 2016 Election Visualized
en.subtitle: A dot distribution map showing the result of 2016 GE
en.description: I simulated the distribution of every vote with QGIS, and export the result in the raster-tile format. Then I built an interactive map with Mapbox GL JS.
tools: Mapbox GL JS: framework for the interactive map
QGIS: spatial simulation and raster tile processing

zhTW.title: 台灣2016總統大選地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 用點圖呈現台灣各地區投票傾向
zhTW.description: 本互動地圖用一個點代表十張選票，把1200萬張選票用視覺化的方式呈現，藍綠深淺代表這些點所屬的村里的投票結果偏藍偏綠。
tools: Mapbox GL JS：地圖視覺及互動功能

zhTW.title: 2018全台縣市長選舉地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 細到村里的2018年縣市長選舉地圖
zhTW.description: 本互動地圖展示細至村里的投票結果，並搭配2014年大選結果，呈現韓國瑜、盧秀燕等藍營候選人，如何席捲高雄、台中等城市。

en.title: The Result of 2018 Local Election in One Map
en.subtitle: An interactive map detaield to the borough-level
en.description: I built the interactive map with D3js. Users can click on any county/town/borough to zoom in to the specific area. The 'switch-year' feature enables quick comparison of two consecutive election.
tools: D3: framework for the interactive map
topojson: simplify geojson to improve performance

en.title: Where Do People with the Same family Name as Yours live?
en.subtitle: The distribution of family names in Taiwan
en.description: I visualized the distribution of major family names in Taiwan. Users can choose their family name of interest and read the choropleth for the family name.

zhTW.title: 台灣姓氏分佈地圖
zhTW.subtitle: 運用政府公開資料呈現台灣姓氏分佈
zhTW.description: 本專題分析全台總人數前三十多的姓氏的地理分佈，並視覺化各種姓氏的地理熱區，藉此一窺台灣四大族群的分佈。

en.title: New Cases of Covid-19 in Every County in Taiwan
en.subtitle: Display the Covid-19 data in a visual-appealing way
en.description: I built this dashboard with the aim of preserving the relative geographical position of every county in Taiwan. The mobile layout is different from the desktop one for better user experience.

zhTW.title: 新冠肺炎各縣市每週確診病例
zhTW.subtitle: 視覺化呈現各縣市每週新增新冠肺炎病例
zhTW.description: 本儀表板用視覺化的方式呈現各縣市新增病例數，並根據地理位置安排各縣市方塊的網頁位置，呈現各縣市疫情曲線走向。

en.title: Do You Know who are Elected as MPs this Time?
en.subtitle: Know the newly elected MPs with a scroller
en.description: I built a scroller to show how many newly elected MPs are female, are new faces in the parliament, or relatively young in the cohort of experienced legislators.

zhTW.title: 互動圖表看第十屆立法委員
zhTW.subtitle: 從政黨、陣營、年齡、任期、性別分析新一任立委組成
zhTW.description: 2020年大選產生了113位立委，本互動專題讓使用者能夠從政黨、陣營、年齡、任期、性別五大面向深入了解新科立委。

en.title: Covid-19 in Ten Charts
en.subtitle: Dashboard for the latest Covid-19 pandemic situation
en.description: I built a simple backend for the JHU Covid-19 data and connected it to the frontend visualization page to make it update automatically. The visualization was done using D3.
tools: Google Apps Script: simple apis for the backend

zhTW.title: 新冠肺炎儀表板
zhTW.subtitle: 十大關鍵圖表掌握新冠肺炎產經衝擊
zhTW.description: 運用約翰霍普金斯大學的新冠肺炎每日最新資料，繪製即時疫情資訊圖表，包括全球和台灣最新病例數字、哪些國家疫情加溫。

en.title: Housing Prices in Every County
en.subtitle: Sortable line chart displaying trends in housing markets
en.description: These small multiples were drawn with D3js. Users can move their cursors on any of the charts to see details of each chart, and choose between three modes of chart arrangement.
tools: R: data scraping, cleaning and wrangling

zhTW.title: 台灣各縣市房價走勢
zhTW.subtitle: 用可排序的折線圖呈現各地區房價
zhTW.description: 我用R語言處理實價登錄資料後用D3繪製互動圖表。使用者可選擇三種方式排序折線圖，滑鼠移至任一折線圖可取得所有縣市同時期房價資訊。
tools: R：爬取、清理並分析原始資料
